output_list.description: The vulnerability exists in the line `totalAmount += _amounts[a];`. This bypasses the subsequent `require` check, leading to unauthorized deductions and logical inconsistencies. The integer overflow in the `totalAmount` calculation allows an attacker to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Predictable winner selection without secure randomness enables exploitation.
Relies on outdated constructor naming conventions prone to typos.
Denial of Service allows an attacker to claim ownership and funds.
Denial of Service allows an attacker to claim ownership and funds.
Denial of Service allows an attacker to distribute BTR to any user.
